feed.title: Speedtest Tracker Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Speedtest Tracker: v0.21.5
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Update README.md by @Kristoffeh in https://github.com/alexjustesen/speedtest-tracker/pull/1759
  • Add updated image to the readme by @svenvg93 in https://github.com/alexjustesen/speedtest-tracker/pull/1767
  • [Chore] Refactor user resource by @alexjustesen in https://github.com/alexjustesen/speedtest-tracker/pull/1783
  • Laravel 11.30.0 Shift by @alexjustesen in https://github.com/alexjustesen/speedtest-tracker/pull/1771
  • Release v0.21.5 by @alexjustesen in https://github.com/alexjustesen/speedtest-tracker/pull/1784

New Contributors

  • @Kristoffeh made their first contribution in https://github.com/alexjustesen/speedtest-tracker/pull/1759

Full Changelog: https://github.com/alexjustesen/speedtest-tracker/compare/v0.21.4...v0.21.5

entry.title: New release for Speedtest Tracker: ðŸš¨ v0.21.6 (Security Release)
entry.content:
ðŸš¨ IMPORTANT

This release patches a vulnerability found in the Laravel framework: https://github.com/laravel/framework/security/advisories/GHSA-gv7v-rgg6-548h.

What's Changed

  • Laravel 11.31.0 Shift by @alexjustesen in https://github.com/alexjustesen/speedtest-tracker/pull/1788
  • Release v0.21.6 (Security Release) by @alexjustesen in https://github.com/alexjustesen/speedtest-tracker/pull/1790

Full Changelog: https://github.com/alexjustesen/speedtest-tracker/compare/v0.21.5...v0.21.6

entry.title: New release for Speedtest Tracker: v0.22.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Fix ping url validation by @nandi95 in https://github.com/alexjustesen/speedtest-tracker/pull/1754
  • [Feature] Skip test when Public IP is in a list (#1714) by @alexjustesen in https://github.com/alexjustesen/speedtest-tracker/pull/1795
  • [Feature] Add markdown content type for gotify notification by @chiragkrishna in https://github.com/alexjustesen/speedtest-tracker/pull/1712
  • Laravel 11.33.2 Shift by @alexjustesen in https://github.com/alexjustesen/speedtest-tracker/pull/1796
  • Release v0.22.0 by @alexjustesen in https://github.com/alexjustesen/speedtest-tracker/pull/1797

New Contributors

  • @chiragkrishna made their first contribution in https://github.com/alexjustesen/speedtest-tracker/pull/1712

Full Changelog: https://github.com/alexjustesen/speedtest-tracker/compare/v0.21.6...v0.22.0

entry.title: New release for Speedtest Tracker: v0.23.0
entry.content:
What's New

  • [Feature] Refactor manual and scheduled speedtest process by @alexjustesen in https://github.com/alexjustesen/speedtest-tracker/pull/1804
  • [Feature] Server selection for manual tests by @svenvg93 in https://github.com/alexjustesen/speedtest-tracker/pull/1763
  • [Feature] Added result url to export by @alexjustesen in https://github.com/alexjustesen/speedtest-tracker/pull/1801

What's Changed

  • [Chore] Cleaned up enums by @alexjustesen in https://github.com/alexjustesen/speedtest-tracker/pull/1800
  • [Chore] Only skip scheduled tests by @alexjustesen in https://github.com/alexjustesen/speedtest-tracker/pull/1803
  • [Bug] Added server id to start speedtest action by @alexjustesen in https://github.com/alexjustesen/speedtest-tracker/pull/1805
  • Release v0.23.0 by @alexjustesen in https://github.com/alexjustesen/speedtest-tracker/pull/1806

Full Changelog: https://github.com/alexjustesen/speedtest-tracker/compare/v0.22.0...v0.23.0
